name: Patched
description: Patched is a contribution to the P-Patch programs in Seattle. It aims to address the demand challenges by connecting enthusiastic gardeners.
technologies: JavaScript, Handlebars, Express.js, Node.js, MySQL, and Foundation.

name: HaruHaru Recipe
description: HaruHaru Recipe is a website for users to share their family recipes. Originally designed to help family and friends to share recipes with ease.
technologies: JavaScript, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, MySQL and Bootstrap.

name: My Keebs
description: My Keebs is a personal project that showcases a hobby of mechanical keyboards. A user is able to upload their collection with custom specifications.
technologies: JavaScript, React.js, Express.js, Node.js, MySQL and Bootstrap.

name: Digital Clock
description: A simple 24 hour clock. A user is also able to change the clock into a timer using the buttons at the bottom.

name: Gym Bro
description: A browser based workout generator that allows a user to pick an exercise critera with an option to choose a music playlist. It aims to provide people with a means to exercise during the COVID-19 pandemic.
technologies: JavaScript, jQuery, SpotifyAPI, WgerAPI, and Foundation.

name: The Lion King Quiz Game
description: A browser based timed quiz game about The Lion King Movie. A user has 60 seconds to answer questions based on the movie and gain points for each correct answer which is saved into local storage at the end.
technologies: JavaScript, jQuery, local storage, and Bootstrap.
